author: Timothy B. Lee
title: Tesla plans to retool solar panel factory to make Medtronic ventilators
description: Medtronic CEO confirmed Wednesday that Tesla will make one of its ventilators.
content:
Enlarge/ Medtronic CEO Omar Ishrak.
5 with 5 posters participating
Tesla is planning to retool its solar panel factory in Buffalo, New York, to manufacture medical ventilators, CEO Elon Musk said in a Wednesday tweet.
"Giga New York will reopen for ventila… [+1649 chars]
